<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete workflow step"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/workflows/steps/{workflowStepId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a workflow step. This is a destructive operation.

**Note**: This endpoint is part of API version 1.0 which is marked as deprecated.

**Warning**: Ensure no tickets are currently in this step and no next-step mappings reference it.

**Authentication**: Requires authenticated user with workflow management permissions.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workflowStepId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the workflow step to retrieve, update, or delete.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"eeeeeeee-ffff-0000-1111-222222222222"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
